Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to fees for snowmobile trail development and maintenance
Summary: Increases fees for snowmobile trail development and maintenance for residents; adjusts the fee structure for snowmobile registrations for residents and non-residents of New York who do not belong to an organized New York state snowmobile club.
LawCode: Amd §2222, V & T L; amd §§21.07 & 27.17, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to fees for snowmobile trail development and maintenance
